official_title: A bill to modify the project for the replacement of locks and dam 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois, and Missouri.

summary.text: Modifies the project authorizing the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to replace a certain dam and locks on the Mississippi River, Illinois, and Missouri. Repeals specified authority of the Secretary concerning the Upper Mississippi System.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the replacement of locks and dam 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois, and Missouri.
